body.name: 22-Inch Neon LED TV by Continu.us | Color-Changing, Non-Smart HD Retro Television, Built-in Ambient Hue Back Lighting | Ease Children's Sleep Anxiety with Night Light Function
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 35 mins
features: 22” HIGH DEFINITION LED SCREEN – The Neon TV delivers 1080p resolution, which offers stunning results as you enjoy your favorite shows, movies, sports and more. Our 22 inch Television is designed to take your viewing experience to the next level. With built-in backlights, your TV will come alive in the dark, creating a mesmerizing and immersive atmosphere. Whether you're watching your favorite movie or playing your favorite game, our TV will add a unique touch of excitement to your viewing exper

COLOR-CHANGING LED BACKLIGHTS - Change the atmosphere of any room with the built-in LED glow lights that are built inside the TV cabinet, with the ability to change the color of the TV to anything in the color spectrum, you can create a personalized and fun viewing experience.

TRANSPARENT SLIMLINE BODY – Ever wondered what the inner working of a TV look like? Now you don’t have to. This TV has a state-of-the-art poly-carbonate body which is extremely durable and unique to Continu.us. A perfect addition to any room in the house, especially children’s bedrooms as the kids will love the transparent view through the television cabinet. Take a peek behind the curtains of the internal electronics.

CONNECTS TO MULTIPLE DEVICES - With a range of inputs and outputs, this TV is versatile and customizable to suit your preferences. Whether you want to connect a gaming console, DVD player, computer or other device, this TV has you covered. For a detailed explanation of all the connections to offer, scroll down to the description section of this listing for imagery.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX? - Get ready to take your home entertainment experience to the next level! The Neon TV comes with everything you need to create the ultimate viewing setup. With a top-of-the-line TV, a versatile remote that controls not only the TV but also the LED backlights, and a digital 4K HDTV antenna, you'll be able to watch all your favorite free over-the-air channels in stunning ultra-high quality. Say goodbye to boring TV nights and hello to endless entertainment possibilities!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 A Perfect Fit 2 Ideal for Gaming 3 Perfect for a Kids Room 4 Night Light Function 5 Matching Remote

Television Dimensions This 22" TV is perfect for any room in your home, whether it be your living room, kitchen, garage, basement, man cave, kids room or anywhere else you can think of. Ideal for college dorm rooms. The unique transparent body means it seamlessly fits with your current décor, and the built-in, ambient backlighting allows you to change the mood in any room.

Control both the TV and Back-lights seperately With a variety of light functions, you can choose the perfect lighting for any situation, whether you want a soft glow for a romantic movie night or a bright, vibrant atmosphere for a party. You can also adjust the brightness of the lights, making it easy to dim or brighten them up as needed. The remote even has LED backlights built in, which can be turned on or off and controlled separately from the TV and built-in backlights, creating a truly immersive viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: 22-Inch Neon LED TV by Continu.us | Color-Changing, Non-Smart HD Retro Television, Built-in Ambient Hue Back Lighting | Ease Children's Sleep Anxiety with Night Light FunctionThis is a clever looking TV. Sometimes smaller TVs are exactly what you need for the space. In fact, sometimes smaller is way better than bigger. I have a 7-in monitor on my kitchen shelf that I use as a TV when I work at the counter.This 22-in TV is pretty nifty. The fact that it is clear, with the LED lighting, is pretty neat.1080 resolution is all you would really need with something this size and the picture is nice and crisp.The remote works well.The only thing that was a bit disappointing was the sound quality. It is a bit tinny. I'm going to hook up a soundbar to it in order to hopefully fix it. Not worth deducting for that, just worth mentioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 8-year-old granddaughter. She's never had her own TV. But she does now. No more having to watch what her mom watches on TV. She doesn't have cable in her room so I got a fire stick and it works great. Very colorful on the ambient lighting, and the picture comes in crystal clear. Easy enough to set up and the remote works fine. A little pricey, but most of them are. Fair deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So...when the opportunity to order this showed up, I had just done some rearranging and the idea of another smaller TV for a spot in my home seemed just great. And so I ordered this. Truth is I don't have any young children. And I didn't pay very close attention to the fact this is not a smart TV. I was simply excited that it was in my mind WHITE for decor reasons.Then somehow it occurred to me that this is not a smart TV. No worries. I simply ordered a fire stick for it. Probably the thing that was most disappointing is that had I known it would take as long as it did to arrive, I may have simply passed. Now I do not know if that will be your experience and in the big picture a couple of months from now I won't even truly care about that.I wasn't actually expecting the sort of translucent nature of this TV. I have mixed feelings about it. And by translucent I mean instead of being white it is kinda see-through. Like when I look at the back I see all the components and such that make the TV work. Kinda cool and yet, sort of annoys me too. Still, that is subjective.Also, this asks about the remote. The remote works just fine. It came with batteries. It was easy to set up and get to work. It also has a bit of a translucent aesthetic.I have a similar sort of take it or leave it about the built-in lights around the TV. I AM glad that they are easily turned on and off via the remote.I was a bit put off that the HDMI port is sort of tucked away and so connecting the Fire Stick I had to use that hanging thingy. Why? I don't like the look of it. And yet, again...subjective...personal preference. If you don't care about that...and big picture it does not take away from the TV functioning.Probably the one true thing that was kind of interesting is that when I set up the Fire Stick, in order to be able to control the volume from the Fire Stick, I had to choose the brand of this TV. There were literally at least 50 brands to chose from and this brand was not on the list. So, I have to use both remotes to work this TV. Not a deal breaker for me. If you care, just maybe good for you to know then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Terrible sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would make a nice little TV for the kids room but the sound is really bad. I am not impressed at all. The back lighting functions are somewhat gimmicky. I wish they had put a little more effort in to the sound quality rather than the LED neon effects. At least it’s not a smart TV that spies on you. That’s another reason I bought this one. No camera or microphone that I could tell.If you have a Soundsystem to hook it up to then it should be fine. But otherwise I don’t think you’re gonna be happy with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice television! Great picture quality and sound quality. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This 22" LED TV can also be used a a monitor for your computer. (Just an idea) Built-in ambient back lighting. Comes with remote. Clear picture. Love the colors. Giftable. Recommendable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant colors on a quality
reviews.reviewText: The led television is a very nice designed unit. The colors are a really neat feature.This is a perfect gift or great for a child’s room. The setup is simple and the lighting is what makes the set.
